title: Social Studies Project-Based Learning Design Using e-Learning Pathway Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customized e-learning pathway modeling environment applying IMS learning design standards

learning_goals: Using IMS Learning Design standards, learners independently design three or more e-learning pathways for social studies topics (e.g., community problem-solving).
Learners can execute and evaluate project-based learning scenarios using digital tools two or more times.
Through learning path modeling, learners improve project outcomes to 80% or higher completion by incorporating five or more peer feedback sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
